hadiths.text: Abu Huraira (Allah be pleased with him) rerorted that Allah's Messenger (ï·º) saw a person who was driving a sacrificial camel (and told him to ride on it. Thereupon he said:Messenger of Allah, it is a sacrificial camel. He told him again to ride on it; (when he received the same reply) he said: Woe to you, (he uttered these words on the second or the third reply)
